long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize any website with site-specific CSS and JS. Tailor the appearance of each site to your preferences, applying styles and scripts individually. Unlike other extensions, I designed this one to prioritize privacy, collecting no data and maintaining a lightweight, user-friendly experience.
